name: [Zoombies] Undead Descent
description:
Another day on the job as chief of security when suddenly, zombies infiltrate the building! From the top floor, the only way out is the elevator, but every floor poses a new danger. With each floor, you must make a decision: will you open the doors, clear out the undead, and try to save any survivors? Or will you move on to the next level, hoping to avoid danger?

In this game you have to:

- Descend to each floor and decide whether to face the undead or skip to the next floor.

- Time your shots with your trusty handgun.

- Take note of your health.

- Get out of the building in one piece!
